name: Medico Reports
runs: Medico legal report is a medical review of a patient in case of a personal injury requested by an insurance company/ solicitor in order to gain expert testimony in support of the cause and nature of patient's injury. When instructed by a client, the most appropriate medical expert witness from our network is selected to prepare the report considering their specialism, location and experience so they can best aid the litigation process.
address: medqon ltd 435 london road, Sheffield, S2 4HJ, United Kingdom
